definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: He is the boss's favourite because he is a yesman.
sentences.chinese: 他是老闆的寵愛，因爲他是應聲蟲。

sentences.english: She has no original opinion; she's just his husband's echo.
sentences.chinese: 她沒有主見，只是她丈夫的應聲蟲。

sentences.english: Because Arnold is a yes-man. He agrees with everything the boss says!
sentences.chinese: 因爲他是個應聲蟲，老闆說的話他都附和。

sentences.english: He is an echo of his master.
